title: Location location location (Safe)
text: Stayed June '04 for 4 nights (2 Adults and 2 Teenagers). Never visited SF, LOCATION WAS THE KEY. AAA price $56 a night. We we able to park Free every night. Pool is being redone. Rooms clean, older but clean. Didn't spend much time in room, so this was ideal for a budget. Easy walk to Mel's Diner-A Must.
